quest.name: Eggspotting
journal:
Qhoterl Pasol has the look of someone who hasn't had all she can eat.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
objectives: Speak with the poultryman at Slitherbough.
Use the large sack to capture the clucking chicken.
Deliver the clucking sack to the poultryman.
Deliver the splendid eggs to Qhoterl Pasol.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: The other day residents from Slitherbough brought a gift most divine─chicken eggs! And let me tell you, to say that their flavor was transcendent hardly begins to describe the experience!

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: I had scarce tasted the first egg when I knew we must have more. Being the enterprising Qitari that I am, I've arranged to exchange our precious stones for their precious eggs. One of nature's bounties for another─a capital bargain if I do say so myself!

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: We have already delivered our first cache of stones, but someone must pick up the eggs from Slitherbough. If you would be so kind, I'll ensure that you're handsomely compensated!

dialogue.name: POULTRYFARMER03829
dialogue.text: I take it you're here about the eggs, then? I'd love to give them to you, but I'm afraid I've run into a snag. One of my chickens fled the coop, you see, clucking like the sky itself was falling down!

dialogue.name: POULTRYFARMER03829
dialogue.text: Gods only know where she is now, but I reckon I'd find her quicker if I had another set of eyes looking for her. What say you? Lend a hand and I'll give you the pick of my best eggs!

dialogue.name: POULTRYFARMER03829
dialogue.text: If you catch sight of her, use this sack to scoop her up. I'll stay around the village, while you go ahead and look around the outskirts─I reckon you might hear her before you see her!

dialogue.name: POULTRYFARMER03829
dialogue.text: I've searched everywhere, but I haven't seen hide nor down of that pesky bird. I hope you've had better luck than me.

dialogue.name: POULTRYFARMER03829
dialogue.text: Ah, that's her all right! You're a godssend! I was worried she'd been gobbled up whole by some bigger animal. She always lays the best eggs─it would've been a tragedy to lose her.

dialogue.name: POULTRYFARMER03829
dialogue.text: Speaking of eggs, I believe these are for you. And as I promised, here's a few more on top as your just reward. Give my regards to the Qitari, and let them know I'm open for business any time!

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text:
Would that the Qitari could lay eggs. Hmm, perhaps if I...
Oh! You're back! Do you have them!? Do you!?

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text:
Oh, you have saved─
Hmph, I mean, splendid! These eggs are even more pleasing to behold than the last batch, and there are so many of them! I would've sent one of my workers to fetch these, but the sad truth is that no Qitari could be trusted with the task.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: The eggs would have been devoured before they were one yalm from Slitherbough. That you showed enough restraint to deliver them untouched truly speaks to your heroic pedigree!
